CSS_mediaInverted-colors.summary: The inverted-colors CSS media feature is used to test if the user agent or the underlying operating system has inverted all colors.

remarks.para: Inversion of colors can have unpleasant side effects, such as shadows turning into highlights, which can reduce the readability of the content. Using this media feature, you can detect if inversion is happening and style the content accordingly while respecting user preference.
